headline: Is Aon (AON) Offering Value After Mixed Returns And Conflicting Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether Aon’s current share price offers good value, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. Aon recently closed at US$350.49, with returns of a 0.2% decline over 7 days, a 0.9% decline over 30 days, a 1.8% gain year to date, a 0.4% decline over 1 year, a 13.2% gain over 3 years, and a 75.4% gain over 5 years. These figures provide useful context for thinking about valuation today. Recent coverage around Aon has focused on its...

headline: Q1 2026 Insurance Labor Market Study Now Open for Participation
summary: CHICAGO, January 13, 2026--The first-quarter 2026 iteration of the Semi-Annual U.S. Insurance Labor Outlook Study is now open through February 1.

headline: Aon's Latest GLP-1 Research Reveals Long-Term Employer Cost Savings and Significant Reductions in Cancer Risk for Women
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today released updated findings from its multi-year study of U.S. commercial health claims data, building on its GLP-1 research first released in April 2025. Drawing on medical and pharmacy claims data from over 192,000 GLP-1 users, the study provides evidence of both financial and clinical benefits.
